DataElement.preferredName: Prior Anthracycline Therapy Regimen Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response that indicates whether there was a prior anthracycline therapy regimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to a prior anthracycline (a member of a family of anticancer drugs that are also antibiotics) treatment regimen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A member of a family of anticancer drugs that are also antibiotics.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An antineoplastic antibiotic that is structurally similar to the benzoquinone ansamycin antibiotic geldanamycin. A geldanamycin analogue binds to HSP90, a chaperone protein that aids in the assembly, maturation, and folding of proteins. Subsequently, the function of HSP90 is inhibited, leading to the degradation and depletion of client proteins such as kinases and transcription factors involved with cell cycle regulation and signal transduction.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Treatment schedule for the pre-clinical trial / therapeutic experiment describing the dosages of the drug and the times of the treatment.

Concepts.definition: A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have a cumulativ
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a cumulative lifetime exposure (prior to study entry) of greater than 300 mg/m2 doxorubicin equivalent anthracycline?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior anthracyclines (doxorubicin or pegylated liposomal doxorubicin) for treatment of their ovarian cancer?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received anthracyclines for treatment of a prior, unrelated, curatively-treated malignancy which would limit their ability to receive 7 + 3 chemotherapy treatment on study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a cumulative daunorubicin lifetime exposure of greater than 330 mg/m2 and greater than 180 mg/m2 with prior mediastinal radiation therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received prior anthracycline, is the cumulative dose prior to enrollment less than 300 mg/m2?
